mapper.select: select id,degree_of_previous_period as degreeOfPreviousPeriod,current_degree as currentDegree,reading_time_of_last_issue as readingTimeOfLastIssue,reading_time_of_this_issue as readingTimeOfThisIssue,issend as isSend,`desc` from hydropower_meterreading where hydropower_meterreading.id = #{id}

select current_expenses as currentExpenses,creation_time as creationTime,reading_time_of_last_issue readingTimeOfLastIssue,previous_period_expenses as previousPeriodExpenses from hydropower_meterreading where hydropower_meterreading.house_id = #{houseId} ORDER BY creation_time desc LIMIT 1
